creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
text:
Task doesn't handle message-driven beans correctly. The JAR built will be named 
"null.jar" and doesn't contain the bean class.

creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
text:
Created attachment 976
Diff for a simple fix.

The problem seems to be in DescriptorHandler.java, in which the EJB is assumed 
to be a session bean or an entity bean, but never a message-driven bean. I wrote 
a simple fix - diff file attached.
creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
conor@apache.org
text: This was fixed in CVS a few months ago. Can you try a nightly build?

BTW, wouldn't it be nice if fixes made to CVS were reported in the bug database? 
That way people using stable/beta releases only wouldn't need to bother with 
trying out a fresh version from CVS or a nightly build...
creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
